reiniciar_servicio_web.description: Reinicia IIS en el servidor remoto

revision_servidores_linea.powershell_command: Get-Service | Where-Object {$_.Status -ne 'Running'} | Select-Object Name, Status | Format-Table -AutoSize

verificar_puerto.description: Verifica disponibilidad de un puerto local en el servidor
verificar_puerto.powershell_command: Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen | Select-Object LocalAddress, LocalPort, State | Sort-Object LocalPort
